item.name: Keen Edge
entries: When making an attack with this weapon, you may use your Widsom modifier when calculating the Attack and Damage Rolls
While this weapon is attuned and in your possession, you gain the following benefits:

* After you make a perception or insight roll, you may channel energy from the sword to improve your roll.  Make an additional roll of the triggering type and use the better of the two rolls.  If the new roll would succeed where your original roll failed, the sword telepathically communicates the correct information to you.  You may use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier each day.
